page.title: 04Day in Life of Mrs.J Hawkins
page.content: The alarm clock goes off at 7.30 and this is the start of a typical Monday. I call the children,if they are not already awake,and go to the bathroom. After dressing,I go downstairs and get the packed lunches ready.We have breakfast between 8.00 and 8.30.It is normally fruit juice,cereal and toast. About 8.45 I send the children up to the bathroom to clean their teeth and then I brush their hair before we leave for school at about 9.00.I walk along with them,taking our dog,Toby, with us.I return home about 9.20 leave the dog,and make my way to work (Mondays and Thursdays only)either by walking,taking the bus,or on the back of my husband's motor-bike.I start work about 9.45.My job is cleaning offices which belong to a joinery works.I work until 1.00 stopping only for coffee and a dripping cake.
